title: By the Lords Justices, a proclamation whereas by one act ... intituled, Act for the further remedying the ill state of the coin of the kingdom ...
author: England and Wales. Lords Justices.
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the executrix of Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Other title information taken from first two lines of text.
"Given at our court at Whitehall the sixth day of May, 1697. In the ninth year of His Majesties reign."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
